SEARCH
Package co.edu.unbosque.electroshop_api.service

Class CustomerService

java.lang.Object
co.edu.unbosque.electroshop_api.service.CustomerService
@Service public class CustomerService extends Object
Service class for handling operations related to Customer.

This class provides methods to create a new customer and to retrieve all customers. It uses CustomerRepository for data access and DataMapper for converting between Customer entities and CustomerDTO objects.

  • Field Details

    • customerRepository

      @Autowired public CustomerRepository customerRepository
      Repository for managing Customer entities.

      This repository provides access to the database for performing CRUD operations on Customer entities.

    • dataMapper

      public DataMapper dataMapper
      Utility for mapping between CustomerDTO and Customer objects.

      This utility class is used to convert between data transfer objects (DTOs) and entity objects.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerService

      public CustomerService()

  • Method Details

    • createCustomer

      public void createCustomer(CustomerDTO customerDTO)
      Creates a new Customer based on the provided CustomerDTO.

      This method converts the provided CustomerDTO into a Customer entity and saves it to the database using the CustomerRepository.

      Parameters:
      customerDTO - the data transfer object containing customer information

    • getAllCustomers

      public List<CustomerDTO> getAllCustomers()
      Retrieves all Customer entities from the database.

      This method fetches all Customer entities from the database, converts them into CustomerDTO objects, and returns a list of these DTOs.

      Returns:
      a list of CustomerDTO objects representing all customers
